shrimp.name: SHW_brushedmtal
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: roughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface.

shrimp.usage: Stephen Westin's anisotropic specular term, using Kajiya's Phong-like highlight from a cylinder (Siggraph 89) coupled with an arbitrary shadowing/masking function. "Roughness" controls the apparent surface roughness, "direction" is the anisotropy direction, defaulting to "dPdu". The specular color value is passed to "aov_specularcolor", while the specular value, to the "aov_specular" AOV presets. The "category" variable defines the light categories used for the "illuminance" construct of this block.
